title: Create a Closing Checklist for an M&A Deal
description: A corporate associate needs to create a closing checklist that details all the documents that need to be signed and actions that need to be taken to close a deal.

tasks.description: Review the main purchase agreement to identify all required closing deliverables.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent extracts a list of all required documents and actions.

tasks.description: Create a checklist with columns for the item, the responsible party, the status, and notes.
Populate the checklist with all the deliverables and assign responsible parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a comprehensive checklist to manage the deal closing.
